statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.GoodsID , AA.AttrType , AA.AttrCode , AA.AttrName
FROM dbo.TGoodsAttribute AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.GoodsID = #GoodsID# ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.GoodsID , AA.AttrType , AA.AttrCode , AA.AttrName
FROM dbo.TGoodsAttribute AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TGoodsAttribute ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, GoodsID, AttrType, AttrCode, AttrName ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #GoodsID#, #AttrType#, #AttrCode#, #AttrName# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TGoodsAttribute SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, GoodsID = #GoodsID# , AttrType = #AttrType# , AttrCode = #AttrCode# , AttrName = #AttrName# WHERE ID = #ID#
